title: Grand Canyon and Colorado River
description: View from The Watchtower.  Grand Canyon National Park, Arizona USA
author: Gordon Cottrell
generated_description: A breathtaking aerial view of the Grand Canyon and Colorado River captured from the historic Watchtower in Arizona. The vast geological formations reveal millions of years of Earth's history carved into colorful rock layers. The Colorado River winds through the canyon floor, appearing as a silver ribbon far below the rim.
